column1: Kata Robata////The cocktails have unusual ingredients and sound delish
column2: but ranged from bland to yuck.  Ordered the tofu as an appetizer
column3: which came out slimy and stuck to the plate so you couldn't pry it off with the chopsticks without making a mess.  It was also 'meh' on taste.  Everything was tiny-tiny except for the price.  After spending close to $50 each
column4: we stopped at Wataburger on the way home.  Won't be going back.
